meaningMnemonic: If you often <kanji>think</kanji> about <kanji>study</kanji>ing <kanji>old</kanji> things, it's called <vocabulary>archeology</vocabulary>. All archeology involves thinking about old things, at least a little bit.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
